title: INSIGHT: 1,374 dancing drones break world record
text:
INSIGHT: 1,374 dancing drones break world record 8:06am EDT - 00:40
Lighting up the sky of Chinese ancient city of Xi'an, 1,374 illuminated drones broke a Guinness World Record on Sunday (April 29) for the most unmanned aerial vehicles simultaneously airborne. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Lighting up the sky of Chinese ancient city of Xi'an, 1,374 illuminated drones broke a Guinness World Record on Sunday (April 29) for the most unmanned aerial vehicles simultaneously airborne. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2Kvvqei
